typography.instructions: Import fonts from Google Fonts in index.css. Use Barlow Condensed for all section titles and asset names. Use JetBrains Mono for ALL prices, percentages, and signal data. Use Manrope for UI labels and descriptions.

structure.header: h-16 border-b border-border/40 flex items-center justify-between px-6 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-xl sticky top-0 z-50
structure.main_grid: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-4 h-[calc(100vh-4rem)] p-4 overflow-hidden
structure.chart_section: col-span-1 lg:col-span-9 row-span-2 h-full rounded-xl border border-border/40 bg-card overflow-hidden relative
structure.sidebar: col-span-1 lg:col-span-3 row-span-2 h-full flex flex-col gap-4 overflow-y-auto pr-1
structure.bottom_ticker: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-8 bg-background border-t border-border/40 flex items-center z-40

cards.base: rounded-xl border border-border/40 bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm
cards.signal: relative overflow-hidden border-l-4 border-l-primary bg-card/50 hover:bg-card/80 transition-colors cursor-pointer group

inputs.base: h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use framer-motion to animate a gradient border on active signal cards.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Add a fixed opacity-5 noise overlay to the entire app background for texture.

images.usage: Subtle background for the loading screen or hero overlay
Placeholder for asset selector if icons fail

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (default). For crypto specific icons, use simple text tickers or fetch from CoinGecko API.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use APCA for critical data.
accessibility.focus: Visible ring-2 ring-primary on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts: Barlow Condensed (400, 600, 700), JetBrains Mono (400, 500), Manrope (400, 600).
2. Update tailwind.config.js with the provided color palette and font families.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the Bento Grid structure.
4. Build the 'SignalCard' component with the 'tracing beam' effect using framer-motion (if available) or CSS keyframes.
5. Use the TradingView Lightweight Charts or Widget for the center piece.
6. Ensure the 'Market Intelligence' feed at the bottom is a smooth marquee.
7. Apply the 'noise_texture' to the body background.
8. ALL interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Create depth with z-index and glassmorphism.
